synopsis.text: Will the brilliance of fireworks light up the moon? Set in the mid-1800s in Edo, fireworks craftsman Seikichi Tamaya defies the strict Tempo Reforms enforced by the city councilor that forbid luxuries, including fireworks. With his brother Shunpei and a diverse group of neighbors, Seikichi secretly continues his passion for creating magnificent fireworks to uplift the spirits of the people. One fateful night, a mysterious girl named Sora appears, requesting a firework that can reach the moon. Inspired by her request, Seikichi embarks on a daring mission, the Moon Rocket Plan, to create a firework like no other. As they uncover the truth behind Sora and the mythical beasts, can Seikichi and his friends achieve the impossible and send a firework soaring to the moon? Dive into a world of adventure, laughter, and the pursuit of dreams in "Oh!-Edo Rocket."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
